item.description:
Hi Everyone,

This is a public event open for all to see and EVERYONE is invited to enjoy the riverside race fun.

---> My only limit for this event is mainly because  the POT LUCK location can not be overcrowded since it is a group members home nearby.

I hope you all understand. (when things warm outside in the next few weeks---its Pot Luck BBQ's on or nearby at sites where there is no limit)...

We may open it up to more later but its difficult to predict right now(depends on a few factors) . So stay on the wait list and we let you know.


 

 

 

 

 

 

<--- This is the spot we will be at.

See its nice and warm, you can

jump in !

 

As with all the events in this group,  --> Everything depends on Good weather quality and ground conditions at the site wether to "GO" or not for an enjoyable social time during and after the event.

 

-----------------------------------------

I will be wearing an "ORANGE HUNTING HAT and an ORANGE VEST" riverside AT the FINAL RAPIDS ! You will not miss me at all with the Orange stuff on or "I may put the orange vest on my chair" since the color is distracting to others nearby.

Check Back closer to the week of the event for any updates or changes if necessary.

Wear a nice warm hat, gloves, coat and hiking boots with woll socks.. (some of us will hike upstream to the other rabid rapids).

sometimes its warm --- sometimes its brutally cold.. ??????

WEATHER: http://www.usairnet.com/cgi-bin/launch/code.cgi?Submit=Go&sta=KBDL&state=CT

SEE YA THERE IF YOU ARE INTERESTED.

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Look at the fear on the faces of the Paddlers, watch them take their last frantic breath of fresh air (not even enough time to scream) before going under the rapids right in front of your eyes , almost in arms reach from you.. Yeah you can also imagine the cold of the water filling their underclothes to a drenching ice bath..or if they pee their pants at that moment--its a shot of warm before the COLD ending ahead !........Cheer em on i say..

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

A nice rain storm a few day earlier will have us cheer on the racers even more as they submarine through the rapids to our delight.

 

Pot-luck after party will be at a home nearby (Directions given out at the event to those attending).

When: As with every event i list, we have no idea untill  the main activity is over and that varies greatly, then we decide when and where.

Keep your food in the cooler  in the car or get it on the way..etc..

as usual i will have some "David Glass"  treats (Random Mix)

-----------------------------------.

 

I am happy to list this event again for the the few of us that may be interested and have a nice Home-style  Pot Luck Party afterward at a nearby location.

Besides what else are you going to do on this day ????..

Its a time to either sit "rapid side"  (bring your chair) or walk upstream to see what's going on with the 3 foot drop and submarine spot so there is some excersize for ya too.

 

 

Updates are being added: http://www.scanticspringsplash.org/

 

I will be wearing an "ORANGE HUNTING HAT and an ORANGE VEST"  riverside at the rapids !

al-r

 

Parking: some spots are nearby on a few nearby roads  (I will park at the Church or closer this year)   or just go past the blockade and try the local road near the barn..but this is an alternate:

**FREE SHUTTLE SERVICE**

SCANTIC SPRING SPLASH
SPECTATOR SHUTTLE

Click on the picture above for a map.

FREE spectator parking will be available at the staff parking lot of Fermi High School (corner of North Maple Street and Moody Road).  The free shuttle bus will provide spectators a worry free trip to and from the Powder Mill Barn on race day.  The bus will run from 11:30 am until about one half hour after the end of the race.

Come and enjoy the race, and don’t worry about finding a parking space at Powder Hollow.

Remember to bring a food item to help fill our canoe inside the barn for the Enfield Food Shelf.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing an "ORANGE HUNTING HAT and an ORANGE VEST" riverside AT the RAPIDS !

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: MAR -30 --Scantic River Rapids Paddling Race & Home Pot-luck Lunch Afterward
